languages.text: {n}Мертвецы глухи к вашей просьбе — они надвигаются на вас с неминуемостью самой смерти. Вы запоздало понимаете, что ваша дрожащая рука нашарила осколок, когда острый металлический край уже впивается в вашу ладонь...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мертвецы глухи к вашей просьбе — они надвигаются на вас с неминуемостью самой смерти. Вы запоздало понимаете, что ваша дрожащая рука нашарила осколок, когда острый металлический край уже впивается в вашу ладонь...{/n}

languages.text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мертвецы глухи к вашей просьбе — они надвигаются на вас с неминуемостью самой смерти. Вы запоздало понимаете, что ваша дрожащая рука нашарила осколок, когда острый металлический край уже впивается в вашу ладонь...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The dead are deaf to your words, they approach you with the inevitability of the death itself. Although too late, you realise that your trembling hand has found the shard, but only when its sharp metal edge has already bitten into your palm...{/n}

{n}The dead are deaf to your words, they approach you with the inevitability of the death itself. Although too late, you realise that your trembling hand has found the shard, but only when its sharp metal edge has already bitten into your palm...{/n}

{n}The dead are deaf to your words, they approach with the inevitability of death itself. You realise helplessly that your trembling hand has found the shard, but its razor-sharp edge is already biting into your palm...{/n}

{n}The dead are deaf to your words, they approach with the inevitability of death itself. You realise helplessly that your trembling hand has found the shard, but its razor-sharp edge is already biting into your palm...{/n}

{n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些死人对你的话充耳不闻，带着不可避免的死亡气息靠你靠过来。你后知后觉地意识到，你颤抖的手碰到了那枚碎片，而它锋利的边缘已经刺入了你的手掌……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些死人对你的话充耳不闻，带着不可避免的死亡气息靠你靠过来。你后知后觉地意识到，你颤抖的手碰到了那枚碎片，而它锋利的边缘已经刺入了你的手掌……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sourds à vos paroles, les morts s'approchent inexorablement. {mf|Impuissant|Impuissante}, vous réalisez que le fragment s'est niché dans votre main et que sa lame aiguisée s'enfonce dans votre paume tremblante...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sourds à vos paroles, les morts s'approchent inexorablement. {mf|Impuissant|Impuissante}, vous réalisez que le fragment s'est niché dans votre main et que sa lame aiguisée s'enfonce dans votre paume tremblante...{/n}

languages.text: {n}死者はあなたの言葉には耳を貸さず、死の不可避性そのものと共に近づいてくる。カミソリのように鋭い刃先が手のひらに食い込んだことで、あなたは震える手が破片を握りしめていたのだと、遅まきながら気づいた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死者はあなたの言葉には耳を貸さず、死の不可避性そのものと共に近づいてくる。カミソリのように鋭い刃先が手のひらに食い込んだことで、あなたは震える手が破片を握りしめていたのだと、遅まきながら気づいた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los muertos hacen caso omiso de tus palabras y se acercan cada vez más, inexorables como la propia muerte. Demasiado tarde, te das cuenta de que tu mano temblorosa ha encontrado el fragmento cuando su borde afilado se clava en la palma de tu mano...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los muertos hacen caso omiso de tus palabras y se acercan cada vez más, inexorables como la propia muerte. Demasiado tarde, te das cuenta de que tu mano temblorosa ha encontrado el fragmento cuando su borde afilado se clava en la palma de tu mano...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Toten hören deine Worte nicht. Sie kommen mit der Unausweichlichkeit des Tods selbst immer näher. Du erkennst hilflos, dass deine zitternde Hand den Splitter gefunden hat, als seine scharfe Kante bereits in deine Handfläche schneidet ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Toten hören deine Worte nicht. Sie kommen mit der Unausweichlichkeit des Tods selbst immer näher. Du erkennst hilflos, dass deine zitternde Hand den Splitter gefunden hat, als seine scharfe Kante bereits in deine Handfläche schneidet ...{/n}

{n}Die Toten hören deine Worte nicht. Sie nähern sich mit der Unausweichlichkeit des Tods selbst. Du erkennst hilflos, dass deine zitternde Hand den Splitter gefunden hat, doch dessen scharfe Kante beißt sich bereits in deine Handfläche ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölüler seni duymuyor, ölümün kaçınılmazlığıyla sana daha da yaklaşıyorlar. Titremekte olan elinin parçayı bulmasıyla, jilet gibi keskin kenarının avcunu kesmesi bir oluyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead remain deaf to your words, creeping ever closer with the inevitability of death itself. You belatedly realise that your trembling hand has found the shard when its razor-sharp edge cuts into your palm...{/n}
